David De Gea is being offered to Europe's top clubs by his representatives as the Spain goalkeeper prepares to leave Manchester United this summer.

articles.author: Theo Squires
articles.title: Harvey Elliott has just learned a harsh lesson Liverpool could not teach him - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Theo Squires watches Liverpool starlet Harvey Elliott on loan at Blackburn Rovers as his football education and progress continues
articles.content:
When Harvey Elliott joined Blackburn Rovers back in October, he had one very clear aim in mind.
